src.groovy.org.cubika.labs.scaffolding.utils
Class ConstraintValueUtils

java.lang.Object
  src.groovy.org.cubika.labs.scaffolding.utils.ConstraintValueUtils

class ConstraintValueUtils

ConstraintValueUtils is used to give support constraint values or metaconstraint values declared into DomainClass

author:
Ezequiel Martin Apfel
since:
23-Feb-2009
